settingsForm.title: Saitunan Gabaɗaya
settingsForm.passwordNote:
Lura: Don saita ko sake saita kalmar sirri ta admin, dakatar da uwar garken kuma gudanar da shi da umarnin:
node backend/server.js --set-new-password SABUWAR_KALMAR_SIRRIN_KA
Samun damar wannan shafin yana buƙatar zaman admin mai aiki (ta hanyar kuki).
Wasu saituna (masu alamar *) suna buƙatar sake kunna uwar garken don amfani da su.

adminMessageText.label: Saƙon Admin (bar fanko don sharewa):
adminMessageText.placeholder: Saƙo don nunawa ga dukkan 'yan wasa

userManagement.title: Gudanar da Masu Amfani
userManagement.noUsers: Ba a sami masu amfani ba.
userManagement.pruneButton: Tsaftace Asusun da Ba Sa Aiki
userManagement.confirmDelete: Shin ka tabbata kana son share mai amfani "{{username}}" har abada? Wannan aikin ba za a iya mayar da shi baya ba.
userManagement.confirmPrune_one: Shin ka tabbata kana son share asusu {{count}} da ba ya aiki (ba ya aiki >kwana 15 KUMA ƙididdiga masu ƙanƙanta)? Wannan aikin ba za a iya mayar da shi baya ba.
userManagement.confirmPrune_other: Shin ka tabbata kana son share asusu {{count}} da ba sa aiki (ba sa aiki >kwana 15 KUMA ƙididdiga masu ƙanƙanta)? Wannan aikin ba za a iya mayar da shi baya ba.
userManagement.confirmPruneZero: Ba a sami asusun da ba sa aiki ba bisa ga ma'auni na yanzu. Shin har yanzu kana son gudanar da aikin (idan da hali)?
userManagement.confirmPruneZeroConfirm: Tabbatar da aikin tsaftacewa koda kuwa an gano asusu 0?

feedback.settingsUpdatedWithRestart: An sabunta saituna. Ana buƙatar sake kunna uwar garken don canje-canjen taswira/tsaro.
feedback.settingsUpdatedFpsRestart: An sabunta saituna. An sake kunna zagayen wasan don canjin FPS.
feedback.networkError: Kuskuren hanyar sadarwa ko uwar garken ba ta samuwa.
feedback.invalidResponse: Amsa mara inganci daga uwar garken (ba JSON ba)
feedback.restartRequired: Ana buƙatar sake kunna uwar garken don amfani da canje-canje (Girman/Siffar Taswira, Yanayin Tsaro, Radius na AoI).
feedback.fpsRestart: An sake kunna zagayen wasan don amfani da sabon FPS.

alerts.clearLoginRequired: Dole ne ka shiga don share sautuna.

confirms.clearAll: Shin ka tabbata kana son share duk sautunan al'ada na wannan asusun?

offlinePage.title: Uwar Garke Ba Ta Samuwa - Kwafin Slither SIO
offlinePage.logoAlt: Logo na Uwar Garke Ba Ta Samuwa
offlinePage.explanation: Uwar garken Kwafin Slither SIO da alama tana kashe na ɗan lokaci ko ba a iya samunta. Muna ƙoƙarin sake kafa haɗin gwiwa a gare ku.
offlinePage.snakeTitle: A halin yanzu, yi wasan Maciji!
offlinePage.snakeControls: Kibiyoyi / ZQSD / WASD: Motsa | Enter: Fara/Sake Farawa
offlinePage.redirectInfo: Za a tura ka kai tsaye da zarar uwar garken ta dawo kan layi.
